titleStmt.title: C. N. Warren to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2072

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
C. N. WARREN, Pres't.
R. S. MOXLEY, Cash.
Louisville City National Bank.
Louisville, Ky., April 11th 1865
Hon. T. E Bramlett
Frankfort
Ky
Sir

We wrote you some time since asking for the appointment of Richard S. Moxley as Notary Public for Jefferson County. Not having heard from you suppose the letter may not have reached you. Mr M being Cashier of Our Bank it will be a convienence to hand the appointment made & we will be much pleased to have you do it.

Very respfly yr. Obt Servts
C. N. Warren & Co

We refer you to
J. B. Temple Cash
Jno Watson
E H Taylor Cash

Jefferson Co
Notary Public
R. S. Moxley
apptd
12th Apl/65
